alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 3:52PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: There remains a chance for a narrow band of higher snowfall amounts than currently forecast to fall from mid evening through early Thursday morning. The area of interest is generally west of a line from St. Francis to Goodland and Sharon Springs west into southern Yuma county through Kit Carson and Cheyenne counties in Kansas. If this scenario develops snowfall amounts of up to four inches are possible on top of what is currently forecast. Regardless, the combination of northeast winds gusting over 30 mph and the expected snow will create reduced visibilities in blowing snow. Motorists traveling across the area should be prepared for winter driving conditions and slick roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
